discussion.p: Add [[nodiscard]] in front of the return type for allocate_object and new_object in class declaration and in member-function description for polymorphic_allocator template.
This issue is related to LWG .
discussion.note: 2019-11 Status to Duplicate during Tuesday morning issue processing in Belfast.

resolution.p: This wording is relative to N4835.

li.p: Modify p2, class template polymorphic_allocator synopsis, as indicated:

blockquote.p:
-8- Effects: Allocates memory suitable for holding an array of n objects of type T, as follows:
(8.1) — if SIZE_MAX / sizeof(T) < n, throws length_error,
(8.2) — otherwise equivalent to:
return static_cast<T*>(allocate_bytes(n*sizeof(T), alignof(T)));
[…]

blockquote.pre: template<class T, class CtorArgs...> [[nodiscard]] T* new_object(CtorArgs&&... ctor_args);
